San Bernardo es una ciudad, ubicada  a 18 km. en línea recta hacia el sur desde la plaza de armas de Santiago (capital de Chile). Es conocida como la capital del folklore, debido a que cada año, en  enero, se realiza el "Festival Internacional del Folklore", un evento en el que las raíces del país se dan cita y se reúnen  agrupaciones musicales de toda Sudamérica. También se desarrolla la "Feria de Artesanía Tradicional", en la que participan tanto artesanos chilenos como de otros países cercanos. Luego en abril se realiza el  evento “Abril cuecas Mil” que consiste en hacer bailar cueca (baile tradicional chileno) a toda la comuna.
texts.en:
This Communal Bank is called "Futuro Dos Punto Cero", ("Future 2.0").  It is made up of 20 entrepreneurs who work in different fields; amongst them are businesses selling clothes and groceries among others.  They all come from the community of San Bernardo in the city of Santiago.

Nelly is the president of the Communal Bank, who is seated in the front row of the photo.  She is the second from the right, and she is wearing a black jacket.  Her hair is short and blonde.  She has been working selling second-hand clothes for the last 15 years, at a stand located in the open markets.  Her work schedule is mornings twice a week, and also the weekends.  She has many customers, some of whom she has kept since the beginning.  

She now wants to start moving into selling new clothes.  With the loan, she will buy new clothes.  Her goals are to have a permanent location in the bazaar, and in this way to prosper with her business.

Nelly lives with her husband and her four children aged 30, 29, 17 and 13, plus a 7-year-old granddaughter.  Her dreams are to provide her children and granddaughter with a quality education, so that they may have a better quality of life.  Her motivation is to continue with her business, as it is through her work that she is able to make a financial contribution to her household. 

Nelly is very happy and grateful for the loans and the services offered through Fondo Esperanza.  In addition, she feels very comfortable with her group at the Communal Bank, as she has known them for several years and has neighbors among them.  These meetings have allowed her to achieve self-fulfillment.  In regards to the training, it's helped her to specialize and to manage her business better.

San Bernardo is a city located 18km due south of the Plaza de Armas of Santiago (the capital of Chile).  It is well known as the capital of folklore, thanks to the fact that in January of each year, they have the "International Festival of Folklore".  This is an event where the roots of the country come together and meet with musical groups from throughout South America.  They also host the "Festival of Traditional Handicrafts", in which many Chilean artesans participate, as well as those from other nearby countries.  Later in April, there is "April of a Thousand Cuecas", which consists of cueca dancing (a traditional Chilean dance) for the whole community.

loans.use: to buy new clothing.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
La Señora Petrona tiene 61 años D. edad, es una persona muy trabajadora, es viuda, tiene 7 hijos, D. los cuales 2 se encuentran viviendo con ella, tiene 2 nietos que la ayudan en todo.
Ella tiene una despensa bien surtida en su domicilio en la ciudad D. Ita. Hace más D. 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad por lo que ya es muy conocida en su barrio y en las zonas aledaña. En todo el vecindario es conocida por la amabilidad con que ella atienD. en su negocio. Uno D. sus deseos es poder seguir ampliando su pequeño local y gracias a eso ir creciendo. Comenta que todo el esfuerzo que ella aplica en su negocio es para la obtención D. mayores ingresos, para que D. esa forma pueda ayudar a los hijos que aun dependen D. ella.
Solicita el crédito para al compra D. comestibles, bebidas, panificados, hortalizas y demás para el abastecimiento D. su local, ya que por medio D. esto podrá atraer más clientela. Está muy esperanzada en el crédito ya que le será D. gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Señora Petrona is 61 years old and is a very hard-working person. She is a widow. She has 7 children, of whom 2 live with her. She has 2 grandchildren who help her with everything.

She has a well-stocked grocery store in her home in the city of Ita. She has had this business for more than 10 years, and for this reason she is very well known in her neighborhood and in the neighboring zones. Throughout the neighborhood, she is known for the kindness with which she tends to her business. One of her wishes is to be able to continue enlarging her little store and, thanks to this, continue growing. She comments that all the effort that she puts into her business is to obtain greater income, so that in this way she can help her children who still depend on her.

She is applying for the loan for the purchase of groceries, beverages, baked goods, vegetables, and other products to stock her store, since through this she will be able to attract more customers. She is very encouraged by the loan, since it will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to buy groceries, beverages, baked goods, vegetables, and other items to stock her store.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo is a married woman with two children, bothl of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past year, she has operated a clothes (Leso's) selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition from other clothes sellers in the market. She dreams of establishing a bigger shop in the future.

With the Kshs 20,000, she wants to purchase bundles of leso's for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of leso's for resale.

loans.name: Barika

texts.en:
Barika is a married woman with three boys, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past six years, she has operated a beauty salon business. Her potential customers are neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition and seasonality in her business. She dreams of establishing another business in the future.

With the Kshs 20,000, she wants to purchase creams and a blow dryer machine. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase creams and a blow dryer machine.

loans.name: Chernor

texts.en:
This is 31 year-old Chernor.  He is married and has 1 child, aged 2 years.  In 2007, Chernor established his cosmetics, drinks and water business. He began his business after he had managed his father's tailoring business.  He did that for 4 years.  Because he wanted to live an independent life, he opened up his own business.  Working 7 days a week and 14 hours a day, he earns about Le 900,000 every month from this business.

 He would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,500,000.  Chernor needs a loan in order to buy drinks, pure water and cosmetics for his business.  In the future, Chernor plans to expand his business and educate his wife and son.  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy drinks, pure water and cosmetics for his business

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman with five children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past five years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling at retail to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation in her business. Her major dream is to expand her business and establish another stall in the future.

With the Kshs 35,000, she wants to purchase two bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase two bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy household products such as blenders, hot plates, dishes, and other items.

loans.name: Kyegwisa Bakyara  Twimukye Group

texts.en:
At her food stall, 32 year-old Ovia sells bananas, sweet potatoes, maize, Irish potatoes and yams. The odds to succeed in her type of business in Western Uganda are ten to one. These odds go into overdrive when one practices farming. In a broad sense that means being able to easily harvest what one plants and, at length, being able to sell the produce.
Food businesses are all the rage in most cities in the West of Uganda. Of late, most of these food sales entrepreneurs have been driving roaring trades selling their foods to the more lucrative food markets in Central Uganda. Many people are partial to bananas and Irish potatoes from Western Uganda..

Ovia farms her land in Ibanda.  She says that her monthly gross sales revenue totals to Uganda shillings 120,000.

Going by accounts from Pearl, this is the 5th time, Ovia's group is receiving a loan, and the repayment record has been good enough.
Ovia says this loan will help her purchase high grade manure for her farms.

loans.use: to purchase high grade manure for her farm.

loans.name: Yainkain

texts.en:
This is 39 year-old Yainkain.  She is married and has 6 children, aged 24, 22, 17, 12, 7 and 5 years. She has 4 additional dependents who live with her because they are her relatives. She helps with their schooling. In 2005, Yainkain established her business selling foods such as rice, groundnuts and beans, etc. She began her business after she was assisting her mother.  She decided to open her own business which she is operating now.  Working 7 days a week and 13 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,000,000 every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000.  Yainkain needs a loan in order to buy rice, groundnuts and beans. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 200,000.  In the future, Yainkain plans to complete her building project and to educate her children well.   She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy local food stuff for her business

loans.name: Asunción

texts.es:
La señora Asunción es D. la ciudad D. Santaní, se dedica a la ventas D. celulares y accesorios, y tiene un hijo que trabaja con la reparación D. celulares, tiene casa propia, cuenta con clientela formada ya que tiene buenos precios y calidad D. los productos que venD..
Comenta que se dedica a esto hace ya un buen tiempo por lo que ya sabe como trabajar en el ambiente comercial, se define como una mujer emprendedora y con mucho carisma para la venta. Cuenta que todo lo hace es para generar un poco D. ingresos, y D. esa forma ayudar en los gastos diarios D. la casa. Su proyecto es tener a la venta todo tipo D. artículos electrónicos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. celulares y accesorios, para que D. esa forma pueda actualizar su stock. Agradece por la oportunidad que la Fundación le brinda, ya que D. obtener el crédito le será D. mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Mrs. Asunción is from Santaní, sells cell phones and their accessories, and has a son who can repair cell phones. She is a homeowner and counts on loyal clients since she offers good prices and quality products. 
She tells us that she has been in this business for sometime and is confident in working in sales. She considers herself to be a hardworking woman with lots of charisma to make sales. She tells us that all she makes is to have some income to pay of daily living costs. Her goal is to sell all types of electronics. 
She is reuqesting the loan to buy cell phones and accessories to stock up on merchandise. She is thankful for the opportunity that the foundation is offering since she will be receiving a loan that will greatly help her.

loans.use: buy cell phones and cell phone accessories to sell.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es: Lucy es socia del Banco Comunal Proyección, tiene 53 años. Lucy se dedica a la venta de pescado en el Mercado 12 de Abril, es madre soltera y tiene 6 hijos, solo 2 de ellos estan a su cargo, el préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de pescado y mariscos de mejor calidad, ella esta en Finca hace 20 años, antes vendía pescado en un triciclo pero ahora tiene un puesto, agradece todo el apoyo que le dieron y que le estan dando ahora con el préstamo, el cual necesita para invertir en su negocio. Gracias a las capacitaciones aprendió a ser mas recta y la puntualidad mas que nada.
texts.en: Lucy is a member of Banco Comunal Proyección.  She is 53 years old and sells seafood in the 12 de Abril (April 12th) market.  She is a single mother and has 6 children.  Only  2 are still dependent on her.  She will use the loan to buy fish and seafood in large quantities.  She has been in Finca for 20 years.    She used to sell seafood on a tricycle, but now she has a stand.   She is grateful for all the support given to her and for the current loan which she needs to invest in her business.  Most of all thanks to the training she has learned to be more conscientious and punctual.

loans.use: purchase fish and seafood.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Tesoro De Dios Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal Tesoro De Dios está conformado por nueve integrantes que se dedican a diferentes actividades económicas, ellos formaron este grupo La representante es la señora Azucena De La Concepción de 63 años tiene 13 hijos que viven de manera independiente. La señora Azucena se dedica a la elaboración y venta de cuajada desde hace cuatro años, es una señora muy reconocida en su población pues siempre ofrece muy buenos productos a sus clientes y la reconocen. Ella solicita  el préstamo para comprar materia prima como  leche, sal, entre otros productos.  Está muy contenta ya que su negocio le deja muy buenas ganancias para proporcionar el ingreso diario de su hogar y de igual manera para realizar sus pagos para el préstamo. 

Los otros integrantes son Milagro Justina se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía. Ines Auxiliadora se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía. Darvin Pastor se dedica a la compra y venta de insecticidas. Candida Rosa se dedica a la venta de artesanía. Juana Betania se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía. Maritza Del Carmen se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía. Maria Eugenia se dedica elaboración de artesanía. Dominga Xiomara elaboración de tortillas. dan las gracias a por el apoyo que les han brindado para salir adelante con esta oportunidad.
texts.en:
Banco Comunal Tesoro de Dios consists of nine members who work in different economic activities.  The representative, Azucena de la Concepción, is 63 and has 13 children who live on their own.  Azucena has been making and selling cottage cheese for four years.  She is well known in her community because she always offers very good products and her customers recognize her.  She is requesting the loan to buy ingredients such as milk, salt, and other products.  She is very happy since her business yields her a good profit to provide for the daily income of her home as well as to be able to make her loan payments.

The other members are Milagro Justina, Inés Auxiliadora, Juana Betania, Maritza del Carmen, and María Eugenia, who make crafts; Darvin Pastor, who buys and sells insecticides; Cándida Rosa, who sells crafts; and Dominga Xiomara, who makes tortillas.  They are thankful for the support they have received to get ahead and for offering them this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy milk, salt, and other products.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS ” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en el  mercado Virgen Asunta en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Gloria tiene 50 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia trabaja en el municipio en el área administrativo, ella es miembro del banco comunal desde hace 13 años y paralelamente a su desempeño en la municipalidad la socia tiene una tienda de venta de losetas, ella distribuye a sus diversos clientes al crédito, la socia tiene en Lima  a su hermana la cual le envía la mercadería, la socia desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de locería para implementar su negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar lozas al por mayor.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Gloria belongs to the "Siempre Unidos" (Always United) communal bank, located in the Virgen Asunta market in the district of Huanchac, in the Province and Department of Cusco.   Gloria is 50, married and works in the city hall in administration.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 13 years, and alongside her duties in the city hall, she has a store selling tires.  She distributes to her various customers on credit.  She has a sister in Lima who sends her the merchandise. She wants  the loan to buy tiles at wholesale in order to sell them in her business.  

She is grateful for the support that she receives, and is committed to making her instalment payments on a regular basis.

loans.use: To buy tiles at wholesale

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna es socia del Banco Comunal Torcaza, tiene 33 años, se dedica a la venta de salchipollos y la venta de gaseosas, es madre soltera y tiene un hijo de 6 años. Reyna esta en Finca Perú desde hace 8 años, con su primer préstamo se compró una carreta pequeña para poder vender salchipollos, con este préstamo construirá su casa, ella empezó vendiendo frutas, gracias a los préstamos que recibe en Finca Perú tiene todo lo que se propuso, le encanta las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal ya que aprendió a poder ahorrar y poder manejar bien su negocio y las facilidades que le da Finca, ahora esta ahorrando para poner en el segundo piso de su casa una Fuente de Soda.
texts.en:
Reyna is a member of the "Torcaza" communal bank, and sells salchipollos (fast food dish made with shredded chicken) and sodas.  She is 33, a single mother, and has a 6 year-old son.  

Reyna has been with Finca Perú for 8 years.  She began by selling fruit.  With her first loan she bought a small cart to sell salchipollos. With this loan she  will build her house. 

Thanks to the loans she gets from Finca Perú, she has everything she set her mind on.  She loves the training she receives in the communal bank. She has learned how to save, and to manage her business and her payment plan with Finca.  Now she is saving to put a soda fountain on the second floor of her house.

loans.use: To build her house.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS ” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en un mercado en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Laura tiene 55 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 2 hijos, la socia trabaja en su restaurante; la socia tiene en el mercado su restaurante familiar y la socia prepara diferentes menús, y también por las mañanas desayunos,  la socia desea comprar insumos al por mayor y también comprar cubiertos para aumentar los que ya tiene, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de cubiertos y de insumos.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Siempre Unidos" ["Always United"] communal bank. The bank is located in the Huanchac district, in a market in the province and department of Cusco.

Member Laura is 55. She is single and has 2 children. She works in her restaurant; she has a family restaurant in the market. She prepares different menus, and also breakfasts in the mornings. She wants to buy ingredients wholesale and also to buy cutlery to increase what she has. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of cutlery and ingredients.

The member is grateful for the support that we are offering and she promises to pay the quotas in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of cutlery and ingredients.

loans.name: Belisario

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en el  mercado Virgen Asunta en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio Belisario tiene 56 años de edad,  el socio es casado; el socio tiene 2 hijos; el socio trabaja como taxista, el socio tiene su unidad vehicular, el socio presta servicio de taxi  en la ciudad de Cusco, el socio requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de repuestos y mantenimiento de su automóvil.

 El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Belisario is a member of the communal bank "Siempre Unidos" located in the Huanchac district in the Virgen Asunta market and the province and department of Cusco.  

He is 56 years old, married and has two children.  He works as a taxi driver in the city of Cusco and has his own vehicle.  He is requesting a loan to buy spare parts and maintain his automobile.   

He is grateful for the support given and is committed to making his payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: purchase spare parts and maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Jenny Luz

texts.es: L. Sra. Jenny es casada, tiene 03 hijos D. 15,12 y 9 años D. edad, L. Sra. Jenny se dedica a L. venta D. abarrotes (arroz, azúcar, aceite, etc.) en su pequeña tienda, ya lleva en el negocio más D. 4 años; el crédito otorgado lo va a invertir en el mejoramiento D. su vivienda ya que esta se encuentra en condiciones precarias; su sueños es contar con una bodega granD., y tener todas sus comodidades en su vivienda para elL. y sus hijas. L. Sra. Jenny está muy agradecida por el crédito otorgado.
texts.en: Jenny is married and she has 3 children aged 15, 12 and 9. She has been running a small grocery store (selling rice, sugar, oil, etcetera) for more than 4 years. As she is currently living in precarious conditions, she has requested a loan to invested it in the improvement of her house. She dreams of owning a big shop and of equipping her house with all basic comforts for herself and her children. Jenny is deeply grateful for the loan she has been granted.

loans.use: To make improvements to her house.

loans.name: Duo Santa Fe Ocaña Group

texts.es: Duo Santa Fe Ocaña. Lauro, de 51 años de edad el se dedica a al cultivo y venta de flores,desde hace 15 años el nos cuenta que esta muy contento porque dia en dia a prosperado con sus siembra,el es lider de este duo y esta solicitando este credito para la compra de abono para sus flores y semillas para poder tener otras bariedades de flores y poder venderlos a un mejor precio, el sueño de el es agrandar mas su siembra y a un corto plazo exportar sus flores al extranjero.
texts.en:
Lauro is 51 years old and has been in the business of cultivating and selling flowers for 15 years. He says that he is very pleased because he has prospered with his plantings day after day. Lauro is the leader of this group and is requesting a loan to buy compost for his flowers and seeds so that he can have other varieties of flowers. This will allow him to sell at a better price.

His dream is to increase his plantings, but his long-term goal is to export his flowers abroad.

loans.use: to buy compost and flower seeds.

loans.name: Solidario Peniel Group

texts.es:
DUO PENIEL
Este grupo está formado por Liliana Patricia, de 20 años de edad, es soltera, y se dedica a  la venta de blusas y flores en la terminal de Guatemala,ella es la lider de este grupo y cuenta con su negocio desde hace 5 años, y nos cuenta que solicita este crédito para poder comprar más blusas ya que necesita surtir su negocio,y tener mas bariedad de estilo en ropa también esta doña Ana Veróninca, de 30 años, casada tiene 5 hijos y nos cuenta que tiene un negocio de venta de blusas y ropa interior, desde hace 8 años, también vende suéteres, nos cuenta que solicita este crédito para poder surtir su venta ya que hay nuevos estilos de blusas y las señoritas buscan esos estilos moderno y diferentes colores y las blusas de tela fina están muy caras por lo tanto necesita este crédito para invertir y así tener más venta y poder satisfacer a toda su clientela que siempre busca comprarle, confía en que fape pueda brindarle esta oportunidad y confía en Dios que la bendecirá, para poder ser buena socia de fape.

loans.use: Compra de Ropa en diferentes estilos para dama

location.town: Aldea Cruz Blanca San Juan Sacatepequez

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz es socia del Banco Comunal Llapanchik, tiene 3 hijos y su negocio es una peluquería y una bodega, solicita un préstamo para invertir en su bodega y aumentar con mas mercadería, esta en Finca hace un año ella cuenta que gracias a los préstamos que recibe ha podido obtener su terreno, agradece por las capacitaciones que ha recibido porque le han ayudado a poder ser mas responsable y aprender ahorrar, tiene la meta de poder terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en: Luz is a member of the Llapanchik Communal Bank. She has three children and she has a hair salon and a store. She is requesting a loan to invest in her store and increase her merchandise. She has been with Finca for one year and she tells us that thanks to the loans that she receives she has been able to obtain a plot of land. She is grateful for the training that she has received because it has helped her to be more responsible and to learn to save money. Her goal is to be able to finish building her home.

loans.use: to purchase products for her store.

loans.name: Estherlin Ericka

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS ” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en el  mercado Virgen Asunta en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Estherlin tiene 30 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 2 hijas de 9 años y 11 meses, la socia trabaja en su tienda de abarrotes, ella tiene su local en su propia casa y vende todos tipo de productos desde los de primera necesidad como fideos, azúcar, arroz, leche entre otros; también vende diferentes artículos librería como son lapiceros, borradores, reglas, papel entre otros. La socia requiere el crédito para implementar su tienda de abarrotes, ella desea comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Siempre Unidos" ["Forever United"] communal bank. The bank is located in the Huanchac district, in the Virgen Asunta market in the Province and Department of Cusco.

Estherlin is 30. She is married and has 2 daughters ages 9 years and 11 months. She works in her grocery store, which is in her own home. She sells all types of products: basic staples such as pasta, sugar, rice and milk; and various stationery items, such as pencils, erasers, rulers and paper. She needs this loan to stock her grocery store. She wants to buy basic staples such as rice, sugar and pasta.

She is grateful for the support that we are providing and promises to pay off her quotas in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase basic staples such as rice, sugar and pasta.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animals to sell and flour for making bread.

loans.name: Vivian Issa

texts.es: La señora Vivian, viev en modalidad de anticrético en la zona de sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz. Trabaja en el cargo de regenta de un colegio de la Paz y su esposo es electricista. el préstamo lo requiere para cancelar los estudios de su hija.
texts.en:
Sra. Vivian lives in a rental property in the District of Sopocachi in the city of La Paz. She works as the headmistress of a school in La Paz and her husband is an electrician.

This loan will be used to pay for her daughter’s studies.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's studies.

loans.name: Berna

texts.es: Berna es socia del Banco comunal Llapanchik, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 13 años, Berna es feriante compra reces para vender, ahora invertirá el préstamo en la compra de reces en cantidad. Se inició en el negocio con poco capital, ahora gracias al apoyo que ha recibido con los préstamos tiene una chacra, tambien  tiene toros, vacas y un terreno por construir, le encanta las reuniones del Banco Comunal, ha invitado a participar a sus hijas, gracias a las reuniones ha aprendido a ser mas responsable y a ahorrar.
texts.en: Sonia is a member of the Llapanchik Communal Bank. She has 3 children and is a trader. She buys and sells small animals as well as grains. She will use the requested loan to purchase more animals for resale. Sonia has been with FINCA for 11 years. She is very grateful for the training because she learned to save money and to be more responsible. It also helped her to be a better person and a better mother.

loans.use: to purchase animals.

loans.name: Ernesto Brian

texts.es: El señor Ernesto vive en casa de sus padres la cual queda ubicada en la zona de  Achumani de  la ciudad de La Paz, es casado y tiene un hijo. Pertenece a un  grupo musical del cual el es encargado. Su esposa trabaja en un instituto donde enseñan el idioma Inglés. El crédito lo requiere para adquirir instrumentos musicales como ser guitarras eléctricas.
texts.en:
Sr. Ernesto lives at the home of his parents in the District of Achumani in the city of La Paz. He is married and has one child. Ernesto is part of a musical group in which he is the leader. His wife works at an institute where she teaches English.

This loan will be used to buy musical instruments, such as electric guitars.

loans.use: to buy musical instruments.

loans.name: San Blas De Arroyo Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son de la ciudad de Caacupé, todas ellas son amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad. Todas ellas se organizaron con el propósito de poder generar mayores ingresos y de esa manera poder ayudar a sus familias. Actualmente cuenta con 16 integrantes, las cuales se hallan en el segundo ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la Fundación Paraguaya.
La señora Zunilda vive con su marido e hijos, trabaja vendiendo diversos tipos de comidas rápidas, como ser empanadas, sandwish, croquetas y otros. Ella comenta que gracias a su trabajo ella ha podido ayudar a su marido en los gastos de la casa y en la manutención de los hijos. Desea que ellos algún día se conviertan en grandes profesionales que sirvan a la sociedad y a la comunidad.
Solicita el crédito como ayuda para seguir con su microempresa, para que pueda comprar carne, pollo, verduras, pan y demás para la elaboración de sus comidas. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que le da, pues de obtener el crédito le sera de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The ladies from this group are from the city of Caacupé where they are all friends and neighbors.  They got together in an effort to generate extra income for their families.  Currently there are 16 members and they are in their second cycle of the women entrepreneurs' program at the Fundación Paraguaya.

Mrs. Zunilda lives with her husband and children and works selling different types of food including empanadas (pies), sandwiches and croquettes.  She says that thanks to her work she has been able to help her husband cover the household expenses and provide for their children.  She hopes that one day they will become professionals and serve their society and community.

She is requesting a loan to continue her microbusiness, and will buy meat, chicken, vegetables, bread and other food ingredients.  She is grateful to the Fundación for the opportunity to have access to a loan that will be very helpful to her.

loans.use: To buy meat, chicken, vegetables and other food ingredients.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda: de 32 años de edad, ella se dedica a la elavoracion de tejidos a mano, ella nos cuenta que se dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años, y es un trabajo que le a permitido superarse poco a poco,esta contenta porque sabe que fape le pueda ayudar con el credito solicitado,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos en diferentes diceños, el sueño de ella es elavorar en gran cantidad su tejidos para generar mas ingresos y estar mejor economicamente.
texts.en:
Hilda is 32 years old. She makes her living by handweaving fabrics. She says that she has been weaving fabrics for a number of years, and that it is a business which has allowed her to improve her life little by little. 

She is pleased because she knows that FAPE will be able to help her with the loan she has requested. She is requesting this loan in order to purchase raw materials to weave fabrics with different designs. Her dream is to create a great number of fabrics to generate more income and be better off financially.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to weave fabrics.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina es socia del Banco Comunal Llapanchik, es feriante, compra y vende cereales y animales menores, tiene 3 hijos, y este préstamo lo utilizará para comprar mas animales y cereales para poder venderlos.
Paulina es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 15 años, empezó su negocio con poco capital y gracias a los préstamos recibidos tiene su casa y ha podido educar a sus hijos, lo que mas le gusta es el trato que le dan, a veces con los problemas ella se siente estresada pero cada vez que tiene que venir a las reuniones de su Banco Comunal se siente feliz, es su segunda casa, en las reuniones se divierte y aprende tantas cosas que  las inculca despues a su familia, lo que ahora desea es comprar un terreno para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Paulina is a member of the Llapanchik Communal Bank. She has 3 sons. She is a trader who buys and sells grains and small animals and she will use her loan to buy more animals and grains to sell.

Paulina has been a partner in FINCA Peru for the past 15 years. She started her business with little capital but thanks to the loans she has received she now has her house and has been able to educate her sons. 

What she likes best about her Communal Bank is the treatment she receives from other members. At times she feels stressed due to her problems but each time she has to go to her Communal Bank’s meetings, she feels happy. It is like her second home. She has a good time at the meetings and learns so many things that she later teaches her family. What she now wants is to buy land for her sons.

loans.use: to buy more animals.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es socia del Banco Comunal Llapanchik, es feriante se dedica a L. compra y venta cereales y animales menores, aparte D. eso tiene una chacra y siembra papa, para ellos solicita un préstamo y comprar mas semilL. y todos los insumos que se necesita para L. siembra.
Julia es socia D. FINCA Perú desD. hace 15 años, se siente muy bien gracias a las capacitaciones, ha aprendido a invertir bien y hacer progresar su negocio, le encanta los ahorros.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of the Communal Bank “Llapanchik”. She works as a trader who buys and sells grain and small animals. In addition to this business, she also has a farm where she grows potatoes. For this reason, Julia is requesting a loan so that she can buy more seeds and all the supplies that she needs for planting.

Julia has been a member of FINCA Peru for 15 years. She is very grateful for the training because she has learned how to invest well in her business in order to achieve progress. Julia also enjoys the savings.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farming supplies.

loans.name: Rosaria

texts.es: Rosaria: de 34 años de edad, ella se dedica a la elavoracion de pan todo los dias,ella tiene sus panaderia en la comunidad donde vive,nos cuenta que le a ido bien en su negocio ya que en esa area no hay muchas panaderias y por eso esta solicitando este credito para la compra de harina para engrandecer en su mayoria la elavoracion de pan, ya que sus clientes le hacen pedidos y no alcanza satisfacer a sus clientes, el sueño de ella es agrandar mas su local y tener otra panaderia.
texts.en:
Rosaria is 34 years old and makes a living baking bread daily. She has a bakery in the community where she lives and she says that her business has done well since there aren't many bakeries in the area. 

Because of this she is requesting a loan to buy flour. With this she will be able to increase the amount of bread she can bake since she does not always manage to satisfy her customers and their orders. Her dream is to grow her business and open another bakery.

loans.use: to buy flour for baking bread to sell in bulk.

loans.name: Dolores Serafina

texts.es:
Dolores es socia del Banco Comunal Llapanchik, ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropas y también hace panes, alquila un horno, lo que desea es poder invertir para poder hacer panes.
Dolores es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 20 años, gracias a los préstamos que ha recibido a podido educar a sus hijos, ella tiene una meta a largo plazo que es poder irse a la selva y con un horno propio trabajar haciendo panes, pronto estará abriendo una bodega en sus casa, agradece las capacitaciones que recibe porque aprende a invertir y hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Dolores is a member of the Communal Bank “Llapanchik”. She has a business selling clothes, but she also makes bread. Dolores rents an oven and wants to invest in her ability to make bread.

She has been a member of FINCA Peru for 20 years. Thanks to the loans she has received, she has been able to provide an education for her children. Dolores has a long-term goal of going into the jungle with her own oven so that she can make bread. She hopes to open a store in her house very soon. Dolores appreciates the training she has received because has learned how to invest in her business and make it grow.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making bread.

loans.name: Noelia Guadalupe

texts.es: La Sra. Noelia requiere su crédito para dar a su vivienda acabados exteriores ya que con el paso de los años la pintura de su casa se ha ido cayendo, nos comenta que la constructora utilizo material de construcción de muy baja calidad por lo que con el tiempo las paredes se han ido deteriorando, para ella es importante conservar su casa en buen estado ya que dice que es el patrimonio de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sra. Noelia is requesting a loan so that she can have the exterior finishes completed around her home. As the years have passed, the paint job on her house has changed color. She says that the builder used construction materials that of very low quality so the walls of her house have deteriorated over time.

Noelia says that it is important to her that her house remains in good condition because she plans to leave it as an inheritance for her children.

loans.use: to complete the exterior finishes around her home.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: El Sr Francisco acudió a nuestra Institución para solicitar un crédito ya que requiere dar acabados exteriores a la barda que construyo con su crédito anterior y ahí mismo colocar una losa de concreto, esto es en la parte trasera de su vivienda, manifiesta el sr Francisco que tiene la intención de acondicionar bien su casa ya que es el patrimonio de sus hijos y poco a poco ira acondicionándola para que su familia este cómoda en ella.
texts.en: Sr. Francisco approached Credituyo to request a loan because he needs to perform the finishing touches on the security wall that he built using the funds from his previous loan.  He also wants to install a concrete slab at the back of his house.  Sr. Francisco says that he intends to do a good job of equipping his house since it will be an inheritance for his children.  As improvements are made gradually, his family will become more comfortable living their home.

loans.use: to perform the finishing touches on a security wall and to install a concrete slab at the back of his house.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es: Valentina: de 60 años de edad ella se dedica a la elavoracin de tejidos a mano,desde hace 25 años ademas de de dicarse a esta actividad se dedica a la agricultura de ortalizas,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos a mano, ya que esta conciente de que le falta capital para trabajar.
texts.en:
Valentina is 60 years old and makes hand-woven articles. She has been in this business for 25 years. In addition, she grows vegetables.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy materials for making hand-woven articles. Valentina is aware that she lacks capital for her work.

loans.use: to purchase materials for weaving.

loans.name: Yenny Margoth

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS ” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en el  mercado Virgen Asunta en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Yenny tiene 35 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 11 años de edad, la socia trabaja en su restaurante; la socia trabaja en el restaurante de su madre ubicado en el mercado Virgen Asunta, la socia ayuda a elaborar los diferentes menús a sus mama y los desayunos,  la socia desea el crédito para ayudar en la implementación de su restaurante y apoyar en la compra de utensilios y de sillas para el restaurante. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de utensilios y sillas para implementar su local.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Sra. Yenny is a member of the Communal Bank “Siempre Unidos” (Always United) which is located in the Virgen Asunta Market in the District of Huanchac, Province and Department of Cusco.

She is 35 years old, single, and has two children (ages 17 and 11). Yenny works at her mother’s restaurant, which is located in the Virgen Asunta Market. She helps with preparing different dishes that are from her mother’s recipes, as well as breakfast meals. Yenny would like a loan to help keep her mother’s restaurant in operation by purchasing utensils and chairs. Therefore, she is requesting the funds to use for this purpose.

Yenny is grateful for the support that has been provided and promises to complete her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase utensils and chairs.

loans.name: Víctor Eduardo

texts.es:
Víctor tiene 40 años es divorciado. Vive en Otavalo con sus hijos que tienen 18, 12, 9 y 7 años de edad. Se considera como una persona emprendedora que quiere el bienestar de sus hijos y que su microempresa crezca.

Trabaja en una panadería, empezó a trabajar solo con un horno de dos latas hace 10 años. Es la cuarta vez que le solicita créditos a FODEMI, el crédito que solicita actualmente es para la compra de 50 quintales de harina, 20 kilos de levadura y diez bultos de manteca para poder incrementar su producción, sus ventas y sus ingresos, con lo cual podría mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos y les podría dar un buen estudio.

Su sueño es poder contratar a personas que le ayuden; también ver a sus hijos sanos y que se desarrollen profesionalmente.
texts.en:
Victor is 40 and divorced.  He lives in Otavalo with his children, ages 18, 12, 9 and 7.  He feels he is an enterprising person who wants a better lifestyle for his children and his mini-business to grow.

He runs a bakery and began with only a twin-shelf oven ten years ago.  This is the fourth loan he is requesting through FODEMI.  It will be used to buy 50 quintals of flour, 20 kilos of baking powder and ten containers of lard to increase production, sales and income.  He hopes to improve his children's lifestyle and provide them with a good education.

His goal is to be able to hire help,  ensure his children are healthy and that they develop professionally.

loans.use: To buy butter, baking powder and lard.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es: El Sr Jaime es electricista y nos informa que tiene la necesidad de solicitar un crédito con nuestra institución para comprar herramienta ya que debido a que le falta ha tenido que rechazar algunos trabajos porque no cuenta con ella para realizarlos, nos informa que el mismo ha mantenido su vivienda  en buenas condiciones y eso es gracias a que puede trabajar, pero si compra mas herramientas económicamente le ira mejor.
texts.en:
Sr. Jaime is an electrician and says that he needs a loan from Credituyo in order to buy tools that he is lacking. He has had to turn down a few jobs because he did not have the necessary equipment to perform the work.

Jaime says that he has been able to keep his home in good condition because he is able to work, but buying more tools will allow him to do better financially.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Nicasio Edgar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR PASION”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Nicasio Edgar; el tiene 49 años de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como docente del nivel secundario y también se dedica al negocio de librería y negocio de agricultura, el socio tiene terrenos de cultivo donde siembra maíz y luego lo vende al por mayor en las diferentes ferias que existe en la provincia de Urubamba y el negocio de librería lo realiza su esposa y así juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de librería y negocio de agricultura. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar semillas como para sembrar maíz y también comprar mercadería como lápices, cuadernos, lapiceros y tarjadores al por mayor. 
                                            
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Nicasio Edgar is a member of the Communal Bank “Señor Pasion” which is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

He is 49 years old, married, and has four children. Nicasio divides his time between his daily activities and his job as a high school teacher. In addition, he owns a bookstore and engages in farming. Nicasio has farmland on which he grows corn that he later sells in bulk at different fairs throughout Urubamba Province. His wife manages the bookstore and together they strive to succeed on behalf of their children. Nicasio wants to expand and improve his bookstore, as well as his farming business. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds for planting corn and also merchandise such as pencils, notebooks, pens, and bookmarks in bulk.

Nicasio Edgar is happy with the loan and promised to complete his payments.

loans.use: to buy pencils, notebooks, pens, and bookmarks in bulk, as well as seeds for planting corn.

loans.name: Abigail

texts.es: La Sra. Abigail   desea utilizar su crédito para realizar su proyecto, el  cual  consite  en  colocar   la  losa   a  un cuarto  que   poco a  poco  a  ido  construyendo, pero  por   falta  de capital  no  había  concluido  la  realización de su proyecto, Abigail esta  muy  contenta   en habernos  encontrado  ya  que  gracias  a nuestro  a apoyo  podrá brindarle  a  su   familia  una  mayor comodidad , agradece  el  apoyo  brindado  para  la realización de  su proyecto.
texts.en:
Sra. Abigail wants a loan so that she can carry out her plans, which include laying down a slab in a room that has been in a gradual process of construction. However, she lacks the capital needed to complete this project.

Abigail is pleased to have found the support of Credituyo so that she can provide her family greater comfort. She is grateful for the assistance that has been provided so that she can complete this project.

loans.use: to lay down a slab in her home.

loans.name: Sulma

texts.es:
Sulma es socia del Banco Comunal Llapanchik, tiene 2 hijos, se dedica a la venta de quesos, los compra en la chacra y los vende en los mercados. El préstamo que solicita lo utilizará para comprase un moto taxi y ayudarse en el traslado de los quesos.
Sulma es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 4 años, esta muy feliz, le gusta la facilidad con la que obtiene los préstamos, no les piden tantos papeles como las otras financieras, valora el apoyo que le dan sumado con las capacitaciones que le ayuda a ser mejor persona, saber invertir bien y tambien a ahorrar.
texts.en: Sulma is a member of the communal bank "Llapanchik". She has 2 children and she has a cheese sales business. She buys cheese in the farms and she resells in the markets. The loan which she requests will be used to purchase a motorcycle transport vehicle to help her transport cheese. Sulma has worked with Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 4 years and she is very happy. She appreciates the easy loan process which does not require as much documentation as other financial institutions. She values the support that she has received, as well as the orientation sessions that help her to be a better person. She knows how to invest wisely and she also knows how to save money.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle transport vehicle.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS ” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en el  mercado Virgen Asunta en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Gloria tiene 30 años de edad,  la socia es conviviente; la socia tiene 1 hija de 12 años; la socia se dedica al comercio minorista; ella compra y vende papa. La socia compra papa al por mayor  y vende de forma minorista, la socia recibe en camiones la papa y las pone en costales de plásticos y los vende por kilos y arrobas. La socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de papa al por mayor. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar al por mayor papa y distribuirlas según el tipo y calidad en costalillos de plásticos llamados rafia.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Siempre Unidos", meaning "Always Together". It is located in the district of Huanchac, in the market of Virgen Asunta, of the province and department of Cusco.

Gloria is 30 years old and she is married common-law. She has a 12-year old daughter. She has a retail business, buying and selling potatoes. She buys potatoes in wholesale and she resells in retail. Potatoes are delivered to her in trucks and she stores them in plastic sacks to sell them by the kilogram or by the bushel. She requires the loan to invest in the purchase of potatoes in wholesale. She requests a loan to purchase potatoes in wholesale and sort them according to the type in plastic raffia sacks.

She is thankful for the support that is given to her and she is committed to make her loan payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes in wholesale and sort them according to the type in plastic raffia sacks.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es: El Sr. Salvador es  una persona responsable  y  muy trabajador que se  dedica   a  la  albañilería y a  la  jardinería  y  de esta  manera  sale  adelante  día   con día,  el  acudió  con nosotros por  que  requiere  realizar la compra  de  herramienta   para  continuar  laborando  y  seguir  ofreciendo a  sus  clientes  el  excelente servicio que lo caracteriza, agradece  el  apoyo   brindado para  la  realización de  su proyecto.
texts.en: Salvador is a responsible and very hardworking person. He is a construction worker and landscaper, working day after day to move forward. He approached us because he requires to purchase tools to keep working and to be able to offer his clients the excellent service for which he is recognized.  He is thankful for the support that is given to him for the realization of his objective.

loans.use: to purchase tools.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR PASION”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Alejandra; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como docente del nivel primario, ella trabaja en el distrito de Maras desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m y también se dedica al negocio de agricultura, ella tiene un terreno donde siembra espinaca y luego lo vende en el mercado de Urubamba, por medio de este trabajo y negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de agricultura sembrando espinaca y también mejorar en el trabajo como docente. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar semillas de espinaca y fertilizantes para las tierras de cultivo.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Señor Pasión” communal bank located in Urubamba District belonging to Urubamba Province, Cusco Department.  
Alejandra, 37, is the member.  She’s single and has a son.  She alternates her daily chores with working as an Elementary School Teacher.  She works in Maras District from 8am until 7pm.  She also farms.  She has a field where she grows spinach that she then sells in Urubamba’s market.  Through this work and business she’s able to support her son.  She wants to expand the farming planting spinach and also improve her work as a teacher.  She is asking for a loan to buy spinach seeds and fertilizer for her fields.  She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy spinach seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es: El Sr. Abraham es  una persona  muy  trabajadora y  responsable el  cual  tiene  un taller  de  costura  el  cual  le permite  salir  adelante  día  con día, gracias a  su empeño y  dedicación  su  cartera de clientes a ido  aumentando  considerablemente y  consiguió un  contrato  con una  secundaria de la   localidad,  el cual  consite  en  realizar   los uniformes  de la  institución, es  por  ello   que    acudió   con  nosotros  para  apoyarlo en la realización de  su proyecto el cual consite  en  la  compra  de  mercancía  ,  ve  en el  crédito la posibilidad  de  hacer  crecer  su  negocio   y a  su vez  obtener  mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Abraham is a very hardworking, responsible person who has a sewing workshop that allows him to get ahead daily.  Thanks to his dedication and hard work his customer portfolio has been growing considerably and he secured a contract with a local secondary school to make the institute’s uniforms.  Because of this, he called on us for support for his project which consists in purchasing merchandise.  He sees in the loan the possibility of making his business grow while simultaneously earning higher income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Mujeres Responsables Group

texts.es: El Banco Mujeres Responsables está realizando su primer crédito conformado por 9 integrantes que viven en la localidad de la comunidad la sabaneta todos cuentan con una actividad o servicio. La presidenta es Nora Jimena tiene 37 años con cinco hijos bajo su cargo de 19, 17, 14,12 y 8 años respectivamente Su actividad es la venta y elaboración de artesanía, ya que este medio de vida lo aprendió por su Mama que le enseño a ganarse la vida de esta forma. Con el crédito quiere comprar cerámica, pinturas y otros productos. El resto de los integrantes se encuentran muy contentos por la oportunidad de mejorar sus ingresos con sus negocios.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Responsbles” (Responsible Women) communal bank is obtaining its first loan.  It has nine members who live in the community of La Sabaneta.  Each has an activity or provides a service.  

The group President is Nora Jimena, 37.  She has five children in her care who are 19, 17, 14, 12 and 8 years old, respectively.  Her activity is crafts making and sales.  She learned this way of earning a living from her mother.  She wants to use the loan to buy ceramics, paints and other products.  

The rest of the group members are very happy for the opportunity to improve their income with their businesses.

loans.use: to buy clay, paint and other products.

loans.name: David Jesus

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en el  mercado Virgen Asunta en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio David tiene 23 años de edad,  el socio es soltero; el socio es comerciante minorista, el socio compra y vende verduras, el socio tiene un proveedor que le abastece al mes  sus diferentes verduras como cebollas, espinacas, lechugas, tomates entre otras y el socio los vende en el mercado Virgen Asunta, el socio también es bailarin del centro Qosqo de arte nativa, el socio baila todos los días ene l teatrín para turistas en general. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de verduras para la venta.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Siempre Unidos", meaning "Always Together". It is located in the district of Huanchac, in the market of Virgen Asunta, in the province and department of Cusco.

David is 23 years old and he is single. He is a retail merchant. He buys and sells vegetables. he has a provider that supplies him once per month with a variety of vegetables such as onions, spinach, lettuce, tomatoes and other products. He sells them in the Virgen Asunta market. He also a dancer in the Centro Qosqo of native arts. He dances every day in the theatre, primarily to a tourist audience. He requests a loan to invest in the purchase of vegetables for resale.

He is thankful for the support given to him and he is committed to making his loan payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angelica nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 68 años D. edad. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donD. nació y donD. realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella tiene un pequeño negocio en el mercado el Molino II donD. venD. productos D. material plástico. Ya son 10 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. El crédito que requiere Angelica es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo bolsa D. plástico y otras cosas más.  

El Banco Comunal “Virgen D. Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una D. las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Angelica was born in the city of Cusco (Peru) and she is 68 years old. She currently lives in the same city where she was born and it is where she carries out her economic activities. She has a small business in the market Molino II, where she sells a variety of plastic products. She has been in business for 10 years and it has done very well thanks to the determination she invests in her business. The loan that Angelica requires is to purchase merchandise such as plastic bags and other products.

The communal bank "Virgen D. Chapi" meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Peru). Cusco is a well-known touristic and commercial region. It is also known for the traditional feast of Inti Raymi, and it is also the location of one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as plastic bags.

loans.name: Nemecia

texts.es:
Nemecia nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 42 años de edad. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio donde vende productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, conservas y otras cosas más.  El crédito que requiere Nemecia es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo harina, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más.  

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Nemecia was born in the city of Cusco (Peru) and she is 42 years old. She currently lives in the same city where she was born and it is where she also carries out her economic activities. She has a small grocery store in her house and she sells basic consumer goods, such as rice, sugar, pasta, preserves, and other products. The loan that Nemecia requires is to purchase merchandise such as flour, sugar, pasta, and other goods.

The communal bank "Virgen de Chapi" meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Peru). Cusco is a well-known touristic and commercial region. It is also known for the traditional feast of Inti Raymi, and it is also the location of one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu.

loans.use: to purchase consumer goods such as flour, sugar, pasta, and other products.

Francisca nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 48 años de edad. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella es cosmetóloga y tiene un pequeño salón de belleza. En esta oportunidad Francisca requiere el préstamo para comprar tintes, champús, tijeras, acondicionador y otras cosas más. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

Francisca was born in the city of Cusco (Peru) and she is 48 years old. She currently lives in the same city where she was born and it is where she carries out her economic activities. She is a cosmetologist and she has a small beauty salon. At this time Francisca requires a loan to purchase hair dyes, shampoos, scissors, conditioners, and other products.

The communal bank "Virgen de Chapi" meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Peru). Cusco is a well-known touristic and commercial region. It is also known for the traditional feast of Inti Raymi, and it is also the location of one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu.

loans.use: to purchase hair dyes, shampoos, scissors, conditioners, and other products.

loans.name: 20 De Julio Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Asunción, 15 vecinas y amigas se unieron con el propósito de generar mayores ingresos para sus hogares. Ellas son mujeres jefas de familia que día a día luchan por el sustento de sus hogares. Ellas se definen como mujeres trabajadoras, luchadoras y por sobre todo muy emprendedoras. El mayor objetivo de ellas es darle a sus familias una vida digna y decorosa, sin privaciones como las que ellas tuvieron que pasar.
La señora Marcela se dedica a la venta de ropas de todo tipo, gracias a este trabajo ella ha logrado salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de su familia. Uno de sus sueños es poder tener una tienda de ropas donde pueda ofrecer a sus clientes toda la variedad de prendas que posee. Comenta que tiene una clientela bien definida que siempre compran de ella.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de invierno, ya que ha recibido mucha demanda de ese tipo de prendas y le gustaría cumplir con sus clientes. Está muy agradecida con la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
In the city of Asunción, there are 15 lady friends and neighbors who got together to generate more income for their homes.  They are head-of-household women who struggle daily to provide for their families.  They define themselves as working, fighting women who are very enterprising.  Their main goal is to give their families a dignified, proper life, without being deprived of things like they were.

Mrs. Marcela sells all types of clothing and, thanks to her work, she has been able to get ahead and improve her family's living conditions.  One of her dreams is to have her own clothing store one day where she can offer a wide variety of garments to her customers.  She claims to have a defined selection of customers who always buy from her.

She is requesting a loan to buy winter clothing since she has received many orders for this kind of apparel and she wants to be able to fill the orders.  She is very grateful to the Fundación for this opportunity.

loans.use: To buy winter  for resale.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 47 años de edad. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella se dedica a la venta de granos secos como por ejemplo cebada, trigo y otras cosas. Su actividad económica secundaria es la  crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas y pollos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de las jaulas de los animales. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Margarita was born in the city of Cusco (Peru) and she is 47 years old. She currently lives in the same city where she was born and it is where she carries out her economic activities. She has a grain sales business where she sells products such as barley, and wheat. Her secondary business is farming small livestock, such as guinea pigs, poultry, and hens. At this time she requests a loan to carry out maintenance repairs to the livestock cages.

The communal bank "Virgen de Chapi" meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Peru). Cusco is a well-known touristic and commercial region. It is also known for the traditional feast of Inti Raymi, and it is also the location of one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance repairs to the livestock cages.

loans.name: Edy Moises

texts.es:
Moisés nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 29 años de edad. Actualmente, él vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Él se dedica a la venta de libros educativos por mayor y menor, él viaja a la ciudad de Lima una vez al mes a comprar sus productos y después distribuye a diferentes ciudades como por ejemplo Quillabamba, Puerto Maldonado y Sicuani. En esta oportunidad Moisés requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercadería como revistas educativas. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Moisés was born in the city of Cusco (Perú).  He’s 29 years old.  He currently lives in the city of his birth where he carries out his economic activities.  

He sells educational books at wholesale and retail.  He travels to the city of Lima once a month to buy his products that he then sells in various cities like Quillabamba, Puerto Maldonado and Sicuani, for example.  On this occasion, Moisés wants the loan to buy more merchandise like educational magazines.

The “Virgen de Chapi” communal bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is well known for being a very touristic and commercial zone, for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise like educational periodicals.

loans.name: Netdap Karina

texts.es:
Karina nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 30 años de edad. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella es secretaria del colegio Sor Ana de los Ángeles de la ciudad del Cusco. También, ella se dedica a la venta de chocolates y elabora manualidades. Ya son tres años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. El crédito que requiere Karina es para comprar materiales como por ejemplo tela, adornos y muchas cosas más. 
 
El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Karina was born in the city of Cusco, Peru, and she is 30 years old.  She now lives in the city where she was born, and where she has her economic activities.  She is a secretary in the "Sor Ana de los Angeles" school in the city of Cusco.  In addition, she has a business selling chocolates and making crafts.  She has had this business for 3 years already, and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her business.  Karina needs a loan to buy materials such as fabric, trimmings and many other things.

The communal bank "Virgen de Chapi" meets every 30 days in the city of Cusco, Peru.  Cusco is known for being an area with a lot of tourism and trade,  for its traditional Inti Rami festival (Festival of the Sun), and for being the gateway to Machu Picchu, one of the Seven Wonders of the World.

loans.use: to buy materials such as fabric, trimmings, and other items

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es:
Emilia nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 42 años de edad. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella tiene un pequeño negocio que consiste en la venta frazadas, cubre camas, colchas, pijamas y otras cosas más. Ya son 6 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. El crédito que requiere Emilia es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo cubre camas y frazadas.  

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Emilia was born in the city of Cusco (Perú).  She’s 42 years old.  She currently lives in the city of her birth where she carries out her economic activities.  She has a small business selling blankets, comforters, bedspreads, pajamas and other things.  She’s been in business for six years and does well thanks to the effort she puts into it.  The loan Emilia wants is to buy merchandise like bedspreads and blankets, for example.

The “Virgen de Chapi” communal bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is well known for being a very touristic and commercial zone, for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like bedspreads and blankets, for example.

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es:
Marleny es socia del Banco Comunal Llapanchik, tiene un hijo, su negocio es una bodega y tambien tiene un restaurante, el préstamo que solicita lo utilizará en su negocio.
Marleny es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 2 años, agradece mucho por todo lo que le ha enseñado, tambien aprendió mucho ahorrar, ahora esta mal de salud y ha retirado dinero de sus ahorros para su tratamiento, se pone a pensar que si no hubiera ahorrado no tendría como curarse y no podría trabajar.
en las reuniones de su Banco Comunal aprendió que nunca debe agarrar el dinero que es destinado para su negocio, las capacitaciones le ayudan a mejorar su negocio, y todo lo que puede aprende lo aplica en su vida personal como en su negocio.
texts.en:
Marleny is a member of the “Llapanchik” communal bank.  She has a son.  Her business is a general store and she also has a restaurant.  She’ll use the loan she’s requesting in her business.

Marleny has been a member of FINCA Perú for the last two years.  She is very grateful for all it has taught her; she also learned how to save.  She’s currently unwell so has withdrawn her savings for her medical care and she’s thought that if she hadn’t saved she wouldn’t be able to get better and wouldn’t be able to work.

At the communal bank meetings she learned that she must never take the money earmarked for her business.  The training has helped her to improve her business and everything she’s able to learn she applies both to her personal life and to her business.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Juan Daniel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en el  mercado Virgen Asunta en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio Juan tiene 19 años de edad,  el socio es soltero; el socio trabaja junto a su mamá con la preparación de extras, el socio trabaja con la madre cocinando en el mismo restaurante, el socio estudia cocina en un instituto particular, el está estudiando para cheff; el socio desea invertir el crédito en el pago de sus mensualidades de estudio, el socio invertirá el crédito en el pago de sus estudios de cocina.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Juan belongs to the communal bank "Siempre Unidos."  This bank is located in the Huanchac district in the Virgen Asunta market in the province and department of Cusco.

Juan is 19 years old and single.  He works with his mother making food that he has special orders for.  He works alongside his mother cooking in the same restaurant.  He is studying cooking in a private educational center.  He is studying to become a chef, and he wants to use the loan to pay his tuition.  He will invest this loan to pay for his cooking school.  He is grateful for the support that is being granted, and so is committed to making his loan payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to pay his culinary school tuition

loans.name: Juana

Ella es profesora jubilada y trabaja en el colegio particular Didaskalio en la ciudad de Acopia. Ella también tiene una pequeño negocio de venta de ropa. Ya son tres años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. El crédito que requiere Juana es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo blusas, camisas, casacas y otras cosas más.
  
El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

Juana was born in the city of Cusco (in Peru), and she is 52 years old.  Currently she lives in the same city where she was born, and this is where she works.  She is a retired teacher, working in the Didaskalio private school in the city of Acopia.  She also has a small business selling clothing.  She has been doing this for three years, and it has been going very well thanks to the determination she brings to her business.  The loan that Juana is requesting is to buy merchandise, for example blouses, shirts, jackets and other additional items.

The Communal Bank "Virgen de Chapi" meets monthly in the city of Cusco (in Peru).  Cusco is well known for being a tourist and business area, for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, for example blouses, shirts, jackets and other additional items.

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

Leonarda was born in the city of Cusco (Perú).  She’s 48 years old and currently lives in the city of her birth where she carries out her economic activities.  She’s a Cosmetologist and has a small beauty salon.  On this occasion, Leonarda needs the loan to buy dyes, shampoo, scissors, conditioners and other things.

The “Virgen de Chapi” communal bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (Perú). Cusco is known for being a very tourist oriented, commercial zone, for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy beauty supplies.

loans.name: Mery Luz

texts.es:
Mery Luz nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 49 años de edad. Actualmente, ella vive junto con sus dos hijos en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella se dedica a la venta de gaseosas y cerveza en el mercado de Rosaspata de la ciudad del Cusco. En esta oportunidad Mery Luz requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo cerveza y gaseosas. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Mery Luz was born in the city of Quillabamba in the department of Cusco (Peru) and is 49 years old. She currently lives with her 2 children in the same city where she was born and where she has her business. She works selling sodas and beer in the Rosapata market of the city of Cusco. Mery Luz is taking the opportunity to request a loan to buy merchandise such as been and sodas.
The community bank "Virgen de Capi" meets every month in the city of Cusco (Peru). Cusco is known for being a an area for tourists and business, for its traditional fiesta of Inti Raymi, and for being the home of Machupicchu, one of the 7 Wonders of the World.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such a beer and sodas.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
Roxana nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 25 años de edad. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella es guía de turismo y trabaja en la agencia de viajes llamada “Terras Majica” en el área de administración. Ella también tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en la ciudad de Aguas Calientes. . Ya son 3 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. El crédito que requiere Roxana es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más.  

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de Chapi” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Roxana was born in the city of Cusco (Peru) and she is 25 years old. She currently lives in the same city where she was born and has her business. She is a tourist guide and works in a travel agency called "Terras Majica" as an administrator. She also has a small grocery store in the city of Aguas Calientes. She has had this business for 3 years and it is going very well thanks to the work that she puts into it.
